content:
Given:
1) X wireless power transmitters that beam power to wireless power receivers
2) X wireless power receivers that receiver power from wireless power transmitters
3) Each transmitter can beam power to only one receiver at a given time
4) Any specific transmitter sees only some receivers
5) A transmitter charges all receivers it sees one by one, for a pre-determined time period
6) Two transmitters can't charge the same receiver
Propose a control algorithm for the transmitter to optimize power delivery overall.
